summary: The Volkswagen Beetle, also known as the Volkswagen Type 1, is a famous small car made by Volkswagen from 1938 to 2003. It's known for its unique shape and was first thought up by Adolf Hitler for an affordable car for the German people. Designed by Ferdinand Porsche, it took over 65 years to make with over 21.5 million produced. Originally called just "Volkswagen," it got the name "Beetle" in 1968. Over time, Volkswagen made updates to the design, but kept the classic look. Its popularity declined as people started preferring front-wheel drive cars.
title: Volkswagen Beetle
